title: american horror story : coven - Fiona meets papa legba
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: this is genius because, like... later in the show, Papa Legba says the thing about being immortal is that your Hell is on Earth.  the price you pay for becoming immortal is just as bad as dying.  but for Fiona, no price could be too great.  as long as she gets her life and youth and health and beauty, she'd be willing to do anything, and she wouldn't consider it suffering.  she truly has no soul, because she has no capacity for regret or sorrow.
Accurate to voodoo or not, as an artist I'm really digging his design.
personally he was easily the scariest character on any season for me
This is like goosebumps for adults
Why does papa legba remind me of a darker version of dr. falicier in the princess and the frog
